Interface INDIProtocolParser


  • public interface INDIProtocolParser
    A interface representing a generic INDI Protocol Parser
    Version:
    1.2, April 1, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
